mapper.insert: insert into member_info values(#{member_name},#{member_id},#{member_pw}, sysdate, #{member_phone},#{member_email}, #{member_level}, #{member_pi_date}, #{member_pi_agg},#{member_clause_agg}, #{member_locate_agg},#{member_msg_agg},#{member_email_agg},#{member_post_agg}, sysdate, MEMBER_NUM_SEQ.NEXTVAL)
